nodes.text: @andytweetsmuch @reavo7five @RobinLehner Your question suggests how poorly read you are.  Why are people killing to immigrate here, from evertwhere, including AFRICA where there are no whites. Blacks are racist more than whites in my opinion.\nRacism is trotted out every election to motivate votes. BLM is MARXIST.

@PekayParker @reavo7five @RobinLehner Theres 4.5 million white people in Africa.What do you mean there's no whites?That still doesn't answer my question.What exactly do you love about America?You think blacks are more racist than whites?Glad its just your opinion since there's 199 known usa white supremacist groups.

@PekayParker @reavo7five @RobinLehner What exactly do you love about America? Im interested to know. I love a lot about this country but we do need some change. Do you not believe systemic racism exists? If institutionalized racism wasn't a thing movement's like blm wouldn't exist yet here we are.

@andytweetsmuch @reavo7five @RobinLehner Just sayin..If BLM, funded by George Soros, ever prevails, USA will become just like Chicago, Baltimore, Detroit, Atlanta, St.Lewis, already run by Blacks & are places black people hate, why?  rampant corruption. Fix that first.\nBTW, Not on same page....I love  America.
@PekayParker @reavo7five @RobinLehner People are asking for accountability.  Why is that something so hard for you to grasp?

@PekayParker @reavo7five @RobinLehner It is a good look. They expressed their beliefs and are protesting racism in America; a very much real thing still. You just said the "bigger fish" is the American System of government and I agree.Systemic racism is a huge deal and should be addressed.Glad we're on the same page

@andytweetsmuch @reavo7five @RobinLehner Not a good look.  Sorry, Reaves, but BLM is anti American all day long. They'll tell you themselves the enormous problem of black on black crime is not their concen, they're after bigger fish.....\nTHE AMERICAN SYSTEM OF GOVERNMENT. You're not brave, you're a lemming or a coward.

I admire @reavo7five and @RobinLehner for making a statement today. I'm proud to be a VGK fan and proud to know you stand against racism. Vegas is proud of you both. \n#WontStopVegas \n#BlackLivesMatter
